"Communicating the construction of the paradise that the world could be"


Are you enraged by the unresolved injustice in society, yearn to
educate others about suffering that hardly anyone is aware of,
or are even just passionate about learning different problems
around the world? Then you may flourish in Paradise, a chatroom
born to give the opportunity to learn, share, and perhaps even
help solve the social issues that dominates our planet. Created
for everyone, you can freely exchange thoughts and ideas on
these obstacles without worrying about prejudice or disrespect.
If you'd like to contribute to the community, then just
grab an account and start chatting!



Rules:

  • Nothing illegal under the law unless if you're oppressed

  • No harrassment of any members

  • No spam

  • No plagiarism of any kind

  • No pornographic or sexual discussions

  • No lying about any of the subjects discussed

  • No hateful messages or persecution of any group of any kind

  • No encouragement of the breaking of any of these rules whatsoever

Tips for Paradise:

  • Use a password with a minimum of 12 characters and a variety of uppercased letters, lowercased letters, numbers, and symbols.

  • Please, please, please! Do not use this chatroom via mobile app! You have no idea how many people make this mistake.

  • Try not to have more than one account. Having more than one account can cause confusion.
    However, if you must use more than one account, then you may have more than one for safety and/or comfort.

  • Try to provide some sort of evidence for the topics discussed.
    Since one of the rules is to not tell lies about different topics, not providing evidence might cause suspicion.
    Still, it's perfectly understandable if you can't find any evidence.

  • Despite that rule of not telling any lies, opinions are very welcome here! Just try to back up your opinions.

  • Be wary of the knowledge you share, and be very careful when giving out personal information.
    Do not give out your country, age, education, height, weight, race, religion, job, marital status, or anything similar of that matter unless needed for discussions.
    If you can, say that you aren't comfortable sharing information about yourself if the topic is brought up.

  • Remember that conversations will regularly be deleted to declutter the chatroom.

  • If you are from another country that speaks another language and you have a background in technology, creating another chain of Paradise in your own language would be an amazing contribution!
    You can change the name, colors, fonts, layout, CAPTCHA, the welcoming paragraph, and you can even modify some of the rules and tips!
    My only request is for you to not change the purpose.

  • Be aware that these rules and tips can change in the future.


That's all!
Enjoy your stay at Paradise!
